metadata.name: First Day / Night Test Footage
metadata.description:
Click on the footage to switch between day / night. 

This is the first test footage of our in-camera approach to filming day and night looks at the same time on the same camera using our patented PlateLight technology.

[Click here to view this interactive test footage larger](https://arweave.net/THBm_UkMgVMoImvv4EMc7hLz9INilh7StHMwZ5RezEU)

We are minting this test footage on the blockchain to archive this moment. By creating this new kind of NFT we are also able to share this development in a new way.
